name: TikTok Trend Intelligence API
description: Real-time TikTok trending videos, hashtag analytics, creator profiles, and sound/music data via mobile proxy. Access TikTok intelligence without the Research API ($25K+/year).
longDescription: Track TikTok trends in real-time: discover trending videos with engagement metrics, analyze hashtag performance and velocity, extract creator profiles with follower data, and get sound/music usage statistics. Mobile proxies bypass TikTok's aggressive anti-scraping that blocks all datacenter IPs.
whyMobileProxy: TikTok uses advanced anti-bot measures including device fingerprinting, signature verification, and IP reputation scoring. Datacenter and residential IPs are blocked or served dummy data. Mobile carrier IPs (4G/5G) mimic real TikTok app users, which is the only reliable way to access TikTok's internal APIs for trending content, creator data, and sound metadata.

trending.videos: TrendingVideo[] — id, description, author, likes, comments, shares, plays, music, hashtags

hashtag.topVideos: Video[] — id, description, author, likes, plays

vs.name: TikTok Research API
vs.limitation: Academic/enterprise only, approval required, limited quotas

vs.name: TikTok Commercial API
vs.limitation: Not publicly available, requires business relationship

vs.name: Apify TikTok Scraper
vs.limitation: Delayed data, frequent breakage, limited endpoints

vs.name: Social Insider
vs.limitation: Analytics only, no raw data access, monthly commitment

competitive.ourAdvantage: Real-time TikTok data at $0.01-0.02/request. No API approval needed. No monthly commitment. Trending, hashtags, creators, and sounds all in one API.

limitations: Trending results vary by region (defaults to US)
Private creator accounts return limited data
Rate limited to 20 proxy requests/minute per client IP
Video download URLs are temporary and expire
Historical data limited to what TikTok surfaces in current feeds

/api/run?type=trending.description: Get trending TikTok videos with engagement metrics

/api/run?type=hashtag.description: Get hashtag analytics: view count, video count, top videos

/api/run?type=creator.description: Get creator profile with followers, likes, recent videos

/api/run?type=sound.description: Get sound/music usage data and top videos
